Lyrics: His driver’s license said James, he went by Jim

We picked the nearest bank on Main and 17th
We wrote down every line from every movie that we’d seen

We want your cash, open the safe, get off your phone

Then go ahead and kiss the ground
A freshly stolen Mustang small block 302

Comments: This song finds Nickelback frontman Chad Kroeger detailing a robbery-gone-stupid. Speaking to Loudwire, Kroeger said about the track: “I’ve always wanted to write a song about a bank robbery. If I couldn’t be involved in a bank robbery, I gotta write a good one. My band members still haven’t figured out that this is a metaphor from an instance early on in my life.”
Title: Nickelback – Get 'Em Up Lyrics | Genius Lyrics
